---
title: "Class 25: Difference-in-Differences in Practice"
---

The goal for today is to examine how to use a DD strategy with real-life data and discuss some current issues with the implementation of DD designs in practice


## Objectives

- Understand and explain some of the difficulties when interpreting the results of regression-based DD estimates
- Be aware of alternative estimators that may be applicable in some settings

## Activities 

- Estimate an event study with constant treatment timing
- Estimate an event study with differential treatment timing
